text: Ra hamile patiharuma hareka prakarako upadesa ra hareka kurako vistrta varnana lekhi unala'i diyaum. Atah timile tinala'i drdhatapurvaka samatihala ra aphno jatila'i adesa gara ki tinama uttama kuraharu chan, tiniharule tyasala'i apana'un. Aba chitai nai timiharula'i ti avajnakariharuko tha'um dekha'unechu
